title.rendered: Hospice Association of Wits Centre Application 2025 | Apply Now

content.rendered:
Hospice Association of Wits Centre Application 2025, How to register online for Hospice Association of Wits Centre 2025,  Hospice Association of Wits Centre courses, Fees, Prospectus

 

An online admission application and registration form/dates for the 2025 academic year have been released by the management of the Hospice Association of Wits Centre.

The Hospice Association of Wits Centre online application is ongoing;

  • First-time applicants to the Hospice Association of Wits Centre
  • New qualifications and/or specializations for students
  • Candidates who applied for admission but were not offered a space or who were offered a space and took it but did not register
  • A student who completes a higher certificate or any other programme and wishes to continue with further undergraduate studies

How to Register Online for Hospice Association of Wits Centre Application 2025

For Hospice Association of Wits Centre Online Registration, you will need the following items:

  • A valid email account
  • The South Africa identification number
  • Students from abroad need a passport

Please CLICK HERE to register for the Hospice Association of Wits Centre 2025

Apply Now.
